name: Monkey Keg
description:
Monkey Keg

Some very naughty monkeys were jumping on a bed, until one fell off and bumped his head. Unfortunately, he woke up the Monkey Wizard! Angered, the wizard curses the monkeys, binding their souls to a barrel. Now the only way to break the curse is to  seek out the Monkey King at the top of the tree.  Use the barrel of monkeys to swing, grapple, and roll your way to freedom!
